thread.section_title: Track and Field on Huffington Post
thread.title: Runner 'Attacked' By Rubber Band In Freakiest Track Mishap Ever
thread.title_full: Runner 'Attacked' By Rubber Band In Freakiest Track Mishap Ever | The Huffington Post

author: huffingtonpost.com
title: Runner 'Attacked' By Rubber Band In Freakiest Track Mishap Ever
text:
Aengus Meldon was leading an 800-meter heat at a college meet in Athlone, Ireland, on Friday when the unthinkable happened. And we mean unthinkable .
Who would ever think that a giant elastic band serving as a pole vault practice bar would spring onto the track, coil around his legs like a snake, and ruin his race?
But that’s what transpired, as Deadspin reported .
Props to the announcer for turning Meldon’s misfortune into a Spider-Man adventure.
Just watch and listen above.
H/T Telegraph
Also on HuffPost: More: Sports Track And Field Suggest a correction Comments 72.1
